generic.title: Tempest
generic.contact: Use the variable <phone> to add it to the message.
generic.clicks: Number of times this secret can be viewed:

generate.head: Please enter the information you'd like to share below. Once you've generated the link, send this to whoever you wish to share with.

reveal.head: Do you wish to reveal the content of this link?
reveal.warning: Once you click through, the data will be deleted from the servers and won't be viewable again.

invalid.head: The link has either expired or invalid.
invalid.warning: To generate your own link, click below.
